Package de.dfki.adom.rest

Classes responsible for the handling of an object memory on the REST interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    APIObservable
    An API which is observable, providing methods to add and remove APIObservers to watch over it.
    APIObserver
    Watches over an API and is notified about any changes to the represented object memory.
    MemoryAccess
    Handles access to a memory and its management properties.
    StorageManager
    Manager for the storage of an ADOM, responsible for saving changes following a given save policy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ADOMeRestlet
    Restlet to represent a single OMM in the REST interface.
    API
    Provides an API for an ADOMeRestlet with which its properties and contents can be accessed internally.
    Config
    Offers data and information that is valid for the whole memory, such as ports and filepaths.
    DefaultStorageManager
    Default version of a StorageManager saving the storage after every change.
    EmptyStorageManager
    An empty version of a StorageManager saving only when EmptyStorageManager.save(java.lang.String) is explicitly called.
    HeaderControl
    Responsible for adding access control information to the HTTP header of a response.
    OMMBinding
    Rudimentary memory access, allowing the retrieval of memories and memory names.
    Start
    An Application running a REST interface for an OMS.
    Tools
    Helpful methods to retrieve often needed information or perform frequent tasks.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MetaAttribute
    Enumerator describing all known metadata attributes an OMMBlock can have.

Package de.dfki.adom.rest Description

Classes responsible for the handling of an object memory on the REST interface.
